Name: Archer Master
About the game: A Tower Defense-Storytelling game about fighting against evil orc! Archer Master is a Tower Defense-Storytelling adventure through a fantasy world created by a one-man team! Build towers around the race-themed map and don't let enemies reach The Supreme Plate. Get ready to have a fun and relaxing time with Archer Master! Are you ready to explore? You play as an archer and defend against evil orcs with bows and arrows The difficulty of the game will increase over time Attacking different body parts of the enemy will have different effects Take care of the world , and you will see it return to its original glory.
